description.value:
Trigger At least two creatures enter the grove

Effect The illusion fades, and a sorrowful chill emanates from the giant tree. The haunt rolls initiative.

stealth.details: (expert) to recognize that the scene before them is an illusion.

details.description: The illusion shatters, revealing the grove to be a lifeless scar and the seemingly peaceful loggers to be crawling aimlessly about the clearing, consumed by rage and lashing out at anything that comes near.
details.disable: @Check[nature|dc:22] (trained) to tame the primal energy, @Check[diplomacy|dc:23] (trained) to console the dryad, @Check[occultism|dc:24] (trained) to identify and heal the emotional wounds; three successes are required to disable the haunt.
details.reset: Unless Silene is destroyed, this haunt can recharge itself after 1 hour.
details.routine:
(1 action; emotion, mental, primal) Myristica bemoans her grove's fate, overwhelming foes with sorrow. Each creature in the grove must attempt a @Check[will|dc:23|traits:emotion,mental,primal] save.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature is unaffected.

Failure The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Dazzled] for 1 round and takes @Damage[2d6[mental]] damage.

Critical Failure The creature takes @Damage[2d6[mental]] damage, plus @Damage[2d6[persistent,mental]] damage. While taking this persistent damage, they are dazzled.
